body:
This update gives the web version many much-needed features from the PC and android versions, as well as everything in 3.3.

  • Added all features from 3.3 Beta 8
  • Implemented saving and loading games
  • Implemented multiplayer: connect to games hosted by both PC and Android players. Hosting the game on web is unsupported due to the way websockets work. EDIT: I've run into problems with SSL certificates, so multiplayer will be disabled until further notice.
  • Implemented language selection (work in progress)
title: 3.3 Beta (HTML5)
